title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced analytics with AWS Cost and Usage Reports  (COP401)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS成本和使用情况报告进行高级分析 (COP401)
abstract: Are you looking to take your AWS cost management to the next level? In this live coding session, discover how to leverage AWS Cost and Usage Reports (CUR) alongside Amazon Q to streamline query development and automate code generation for detailed cost allocation. Learn best practices for breaking down costs, access control of your data access and optimization discoveries. Walk away with practical techniques for analyzing usage patterns, optimizing spend, and building secure, scalable cost analytics solutions on AWS.
abstract_cn: 您是否希望将AWS成本管理提升到新的水平？在这个实时编程会话中，了解如何利用AWS成本和使用报告(CUR)与Amazon Q相结合，简化查询开发并自动化代码生成以实现详细的成本分配。学习成本分解、数据访问控制和优化发现的最佳实践。掌握分析使用模式、优化支出以及在AWS上构建安全、可扩展的成本分析解决方案的实用技术。
